function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Projects necessary for the delivery of health care services, such as hospitals, health-care facilities, and pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities.","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission within healthcare facilities and pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control protocols and regular disinfection.","Technologies":"Biometric access control, UV-C disinfection systems, air purifiers.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, pharmaceutical staff.","Owner":"Healthcare management, facility owners, pharmaceutical companies."},{"Description":"Transportation projects, including bridges, roadwork, and highways.","Impact":"Risk of disease spread among construction workers and commuters.","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing protocols, provide personal protective equipment (PPE), conduct regular testing.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening systems, digital health passports.","People":"Construction workers, commuters, project managers.","Owner":"Construction companies, transportation authorities, project managers."},{"Description":"Affordable-housing residential projects.","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission among construction workers and future residents.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, provide PPE, promote vaccination.","Technologies":"Smart building systems, touchless entry systems, air quality monitoring.","People":"Construction workers, future residents, housing developers.","Owner":"Construction companies, housing developers, local government."}]}
